item.title: I get an error on my client when spawning an item i added
item.dc:creator: @Skelebob Skelebob
item.description:
@Skelebob wrote:

When i go on my client and spawn my new item, i get this.

Btw, it worked fine before i added 2 of the items to item and item4.java, so i figured i should post it here.

Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 at Class8.method198(Class8.java:1767) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:6329) at client.method105(client.java:9198) at client.method36(client.java:1740) at client.method102(client.java:8753) at client.method9(client.java:9958) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:121) at client.run(client.java:5012) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619)

And in my class8, the codes are

if(i == 13996){ //~Skelebob's Platebody~ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; //Purple: 926-127 class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8128; class8.anInt174 = 2378;//Item Look class8.anInt181 = 1180; class8.anInt190 = 452; class8.anInt198 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 3379; class8.anInt200 = 3383; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.aString170 = "Skelebob's Platebody"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Skelebob's Platebody of War".getBytes(); }

if(i == 13990){ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8128; class8.anInt174 = 12214; class8.anInt181 = 1957; class8.anInt190 = 498; class8.anInt198 = 484; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = -1; class8.anInt194 = -1; class8.anInt175 = -1; class8.anInt197 = -1; class8.anInt165 = 12213; class8.anInt200 = 12213; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.aString170 = "Skelebob's WarSword"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A Sword Containing the Powers of an Ancient God.".getBytes(); }

if(i == 13994) { //~Skelebob's Platelegs~ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 14057; // class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.anInt181 = 750; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 126; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 129; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = -1; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 1; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int[0]; class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8128; class8.anInt165 = 14058;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 14058;//female wearing class8.anInt204 = 28; class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Skelebob's Helm";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "The Helmet Skelebob Wore when he defeated the gods.".getBytes();//examin info }

if(i == 13995){ //~Skelebob's Platelegs~ class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear"; class8.anIntArray156 = new int[1]; class8.anIntArray160 = new int [1]; //Purple: 926-127 class8.anIntArray156[0] = 926; class8.anIntArray160[0] = 8128; class8.anInt174 = 5026;//Item Look class8.anInt181 = 800; class8.anInt190 = 160; class8.anInt198 = 152; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt169 = 3; class8.anInt194 = -5; class8.anInt165 = 5024; class8.anInt200 = 5024; class8.anInt175 = 5024; class8.anInt197 = 5024; class8.aString170 = "Skelebob's Platelegs"; class8.aByteArray178 = "Skelebob's Platelegs of War".getBytes(); }
When i spawn any of the above, my client crashes and i get the error at the top of the page.
Does anyone know why? Help would be appreciated
